Text: Yep finally got 2 of my babies working again! An odd thing happened however, I am now able to play the full English versions!
So what is the key?Biohazard 2 wont install without the key!I
Doesn't matter I worked it out,it's a bit confusing with the text but seems to play ok

The CD-KEY is on the root of the the DVD-ROM in the form of a text file. Can't miss it. (assuming you've mounted / burned it).
 Installation is a snap, even if you don't understand Japanese. Use your intuition, damn it. ;)  
You can use AppLocale for setup.exe if you wanna see the japanese text on a non-japanese Windows.
